title: Technology-Integrated Creative Mathematics Instructional Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Constructing a constructivist learning environment with digital devices, improving practical skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Successfully complete mathematical problem-solving projects with over 80% achievement using a constructivist learning environment model
Design three or more creative mathematics teaching materials using digital tools (GeoGebra, Desmos, etc.)
Develop two or more mathematics learning modules incorporating peer feedback on an online collaboration platform
Improve technology-integrated lesson design capabilities by over 70% based on reflective practice records
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
